plot outline: Pyaar Mein Aisa Hota Hai is a 2013 Indian Hindi film, directed by Rajeesh Kumar and produced by Rajeesh Kumar & Afsar Khan. The film stars Mohd Nazim, Rohit Rajawat, Aanamika Bawa in lead roles. The film had musical score by Shabab Azmi. Watch the full movie, Pyaar Mein Aisa Hota Hai online, only on Eros Now.
